message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.HC, cs.LG 

This paper deals with the prediction of visual attention data from media, specifically Omnidirectional Images (ODIs), using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also discusses adapting known techniques to a new kind of media, which could fall under cs.GR (Graphics) or cs.MM (Multimedia). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of the generated saliency maps for content creation, which could be relevant to cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction). Finally, the paper proposes an architectural extension to CNNs, which could be of interest to researchers in cs.LG (Machine Learning).
